channel.title: Port Forwarding!
channel.description:
Perfect PortForward
To start open your little computer ICON down there by the right bottom of the screen. Go to support and look for Gateway IP. Now that is the IP you put in your web browser to view your router/motumn web page. The web page varrys from router to router so there should be link that looks something like this... [URL=http://img209.imageshack.us/my.php?image=routerhn2.png][IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/5435/routerhn2.th.png[/img][/URL] Then go to Forwarding or your on the right screen... Now you should get a page kinda or sorta like this :D [URL=http://img516.imageshack.us/my.php?image=router2yo8.png][IMG]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/617/router2yo8.th.png[/img][/URL] [code] Port to Port: 43459 to 43459 Protocol: FTP=UDP HTTP=TCP [/code] Now your portforwarded thank-you![br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2007, 06:49:53 PM[/size][hr]Okay I have NO responses and have 16 views please post or ill remove!

item.title: Port Forwarding!
item.dc:creator: @Drew_Scape Drew_Scape
item.description:
@Drew_Scape wrote:

Perfect PortForward

To start open your little computer ICON down there by the right bottom of the screen. Go to support and look for Gateway IP. Now that is the IP you put in your web browser to view your router/motumn web page. The web page varrys from router to router so there should be link that looks something like this…

Then go to Forwarding or your on the right screen… Now you should get a page kinda or sorta like this 

Port to Port: 43459 to 43459
Protocol: FTP=UDP HTTP=TCP

Now your portforwarded thank-you![br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2007, 06:49:53 PM[/size][hr]Okay I have NO responses and have 16 views please post or ill remove!
